name: Warrior Back Plate
description: This medieval warrior back plate consists of a metal doseret with large leather straps and adorned with rivets.  This back plate is made to fit with the warrior breast plate and has all the necessary straps.

name: King Back Plate
description: This medieval dark warrior back plate consists of a metal doseret in the epic metal finish with large leather straps and adorned with rivets.  This back plate is made to fit with the warrior breast plate and has all the necessary straps.

name: Warrior Back Plate, Dark
description: This medieval king back plate consists of a metal doseret has large leather straps and adorned with rivets.  This back plate is made to fit with the warrior breast plate and has all the necessary straps.
